connector.description:
A Kamelet that can produce events to an IBM MQ message queue using JMS.

In your KameletBinding file, you must explicitly declare the IBM MQ Server driver dependency in spec->integration->dependencies

- "mvn:com.ibm.mq:com.ibm.mq.allclient:<version>"

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.serverName.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.serverName
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.serverName.description: IBM MQ Server name or address

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.destinatio.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.destinationType
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.destinatio.description: The JMS destination type (queue or topic)

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.queueManag.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.queueManager
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.queueManag.description: Name of the IBM MQ Queue Manager

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.channel.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.channel
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.channel.description: Name of the IBM MQ Channel

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.clientId.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.clientId
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.clientId.description: Name of the IBM MQ Client ID

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.username.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.username
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.username.description: Username to authenticate to IBM MQ server

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.password.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.password
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.password.description: Password to authenticate to IBM MQ server

camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.sslCipherS.name: camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.sslCipherSuite
camel.kamelet.jms-ibm-mq-sink.sslCipherS.description: CipherSuite to use for enabling TLS
